entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , White Rock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 9:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: 12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: 5.9°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the water this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southeast 40 gusting to 60 near the water late in the evening and overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
